stories.text:
While building our last tool, we’ve been using tools that run queries on our data warehouse and have increased our compute costs at a surprising rate (particularly painful on Snowflake and Big Query).

We’re investigating if we should create a tool that breaks down your data warehousing compute costs and suggests ways to reduce the amount a company spends on their data warehouse.

If this is something that resonates with you, we would love you to see how much we could reduce your data warehouse costs for free. If you're interested, you can fill out this form: https://tally.so/r/w5xMN3
stories.title: We'll lower your data warehouse costs for free
